title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 360 - MEDICAL ASSISTANCE
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 360 - MEDICAL ASSISTANCE
State Regulations

Subpart 360-1 - Introduction And Definitions (§ 360-1.1 to 360-1.4)

Subpart 360-2 - Application Process (§ 360-2.1 to 360-2.9)

Subpart 360-3 - ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS (§ 360-3.1 to 360-3.8)

Subpart 360-4 - Financial Eligibility (§ 360-4.1 to 360-4.10)

Subpart 360-5 - Eligibility Based On Disability (§ 360-5.1 to 360-5.12)

Subpart 360-6 - Entitlement To Medical Assistance (§ 360-6.1 to 360-6.8)

Subpart 360-7 - Payment For Services (§ 360-7.1 to 360-7.12)

Subpart 360-8 - Confidentiality Of Hiv- And Aids-related Information (§ 360-8.1)

Subpart 360-9 - Catastrophic Health Care Expense Program (§ 360-9.1 to 360-9.7)

Subpart 360-10 - MEDICAID MANAGED CARE PROGRAMS (§ 360-10.1 to 360-10.12)

Subpart 360-11 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 360

Statutory authority: N.Y. Const., art. XVII, § 2; Public

Health Law, §§ 201, 206, 2529[2]; Social Services Law, §§ 17, 20, 34, 104-b, 131, 131-a, 142-a, 355[3], 358, 363-a, 363-b, 364, 364-i, 364-j, 365, 365-a, 365-b, 366, 367-a, 368-a, 369, 369-ee, 373-a, 407; L. 1966, chs. 256, 257; L. 1971, ch. 110, § 83; L. 1990, ch. 938; L. 1995, ch. 81

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
